mapper.select: select o.order_id, c.cust_id, m.movie_id, m.movie_title, o.saleprice , c.cust_name, c.cust_phone, o.borrowdate, o.returndate FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.cust_id = c.cust_id JOIN movies m ON m.movie_id = o.movie_id;

select o.order_id, c.cust_id, m.movie_id, m.movie_title, o.saleprice , c.cust_name, c.cust_phone, o.borrowdate, o.returndate FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.cust_id = c.cust_id JOIN movies m ON m.movie_id = o.movie_id where order_id = #{order_id};
